description.value: Your studies of the undead have taught you telltale signs of a disguised undead creature. When you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Pursue a Lead] that involves a corpse or creature within your reach, you can touch that corpse or creature to immediately determine if it is undead. You also gain a +1 circumstance bonus to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Recall Knowledge] checks about undead creatures and to determine if a creature is undead.
